wikipedia_page.main: Robert Henry King, 4th Earl of Kingston (4 October 1796 – 21 January 1867), styled The Honourable Robert King until 1837 and Viscount Kingsborough between 1837 and 1839,  was an Irish peer, soldier and Whig politician.
